name: FiveBuckToken
description: Template token that can be purchased. World's smallest crowd sale.

eventDecorators.name: Transfer
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Gets the balance of the specified address.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to query the the balance of.

returnDecorators.description: An uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address.

functionDecorators.name: totalSupply
functionDecorators.description: Total number of tokens in existence.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: Transfer token to a specified address.
